ygData.subject: New
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, im new to the class and new to the list. I have been playing a Druid for some time, and always wanted to be a paladin, but didnt want to quit. Well
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all, im new to the class and new to the list. I have been playing a Druid for some time, and always wanted to be a paladin, but didnt want to quit. Well the soloing nerf was the last straw, and i have a lot of ?'s for you all ;) First, what are any and all paladin websites? I'm going to be a human, and in the long run, where is the best spot to put my points? Any other tips you can give me as a new paladin? Thanks for your time.

Unnamed soon to be Paladin
